long_description: The fully cushioned Zero Drop(TM) Altra Intuition 2.0 Road-Running Shoes are designed specifically for women's feet and have been updated with more responsiveness and flexibility. Without adding any extra weight, this latest version of the Intuition 2.0 has also been updated with a touch of extra cushioning to make the shoes even better for long runs. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Foot-shaped toe boxes and female-specific design combine to place your feet in a natural, healthy position for better technique and more comfort. Uppers are made with quick-dry air mesh to keep your feet cool. Altra Intuition 2 Road-Running Shoes have a total stack height of 25mm.
short_description: The fully cushioned Zero Drop(TM) Altra Intuition 2.0 Road-Running Shoes are designed specifically for women's feet and have been updated with more responsiveness and flexibility.
